title: Mayor Pete (film)
added: '''''Mayor Pete''''' is an upcoming American [[documentary]] film directed and produced by [[Jesse Moss (filmmaker)|Jesse Moss]]. It follows [[Pete Buttigeg]] as he runs for [[President of the United States]].
The film follows [[Pete Buttigeg]] as he runs for the [[President of the United States]].

In July 2019, it was announced [[Pete Buttigeg]] would appear in a documentary film, with [[principal photography]] underway, with [[Liz Garbus]] and [[Dan Cogan]] set to produce under their Story Syndicate banner.<ref>{{cite web|url=https://www.axios.com/mayor-pete-buttigieg-2020-campaign-documentary-f595500a-dc04-4fe2-bc91-1d9495cbb066.html|title=Mayor Pete Buttigieg is filming a campaign documentary|website=[[Axios (website)|Axios]]|first=Alexi|last=McCammond|date=July 2, 2019|accessdate=February 24, 2021}}</ref> In November 2020, it was announced [[Jesse Moss (filmmaker)|Jesse Moss]] had directed the film.<ref>{{cite web|url=https://www.indiewire.com/2020/11/sundance-wish-list-2021-1234600474/|title=Sundance Wish List: 50 Films We Hope Will Premiere at the Festival in 2021|website=[[IndieWire]]|author=Various|date=November 24, 2020|accessdate=February 24, 2021}}</ref>

In February 2021, [[Amazon Studios]] acquired distribution rights to the film.<ref>{{cite web|url=https://www.hollywoodreporter.com/news/pete-buttigieg-doc-mayor-pete-lands-at-amazon-studios|title=Pete Buttigieg Doc 'Mayor Pete' Lands at Amazon Studios|website=[[The Hollywood Reporter]]|first=Etan|last=Vlessing|date=February 22, 2021|accessdate=February 24, 2021}}</ref>
[[Category:Documentary films about elections in the United States]]
